stories.Title: Surf the web with ChatGPT
stories.Description: ChatGPT's new "Browsing" feature is now available for mobile users, but there's a catch: it's exclusively powered by Bing. Does this compromise the quality of the results?
stories.Tweet: Surf the web with ChatGPT 📦 ChatGPT's new "Browsing" feature is now available for mobile users, but there's a catch: it's exclusively powered by Bing. Does this compromise the quality of the results? #chatgpt https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/27/openais-chatgpt-app-can-now-search-the-web-but-only-via-bing/

stories.Title: Nvidia join forces with Snowflake
stories.Description: With this partnership, businesses can leverage Nvidia's power to search and build applications on top of their data in Snowflake, without the hassle of copying or moving it elsewhere.
stories.Tweet: Nvidia join forces with Snowflake 📦 With this partnership, businesses can leverage Nvidia's power to search and build applications on top of their data in Snowflake, without the hassle of copying or moving it elsewhere. #NVIDIA https://www.zdnet.com/article/nvidia-teams-up-with-snowflake-for-large-language-model-ai/

stories.Title: Is the AI hype worth the investment?
stories.Description: The race for AI dominance is fueling a surge in corporate acquisitions and investments. But as companies strive to stay ahead, maybe not everyone needs to get AI-powered.
stories.Tweet: Is the AI hype worth the investment? 📦 The race for AI dominance is fueling a surge in corporate acquisitions and investments. But as companies strive to stay ahead, maybe not everyone needs to get AI-powered. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/06/28/ai-buying-spree-acquisitions

stories.Title: Let AI plan your adventure
stories.Description: Booking has introduced its AI trip planner, powered by advanced machine learning and OpenAI's ChatGPT. An innovative tool that streamlines the planning process for users.
stories.Tweet: Let AI plan your adventure 📦 Booking has introduced its AI trip planner, powered by advanced machine learning and OpenAI's ChatGPT. An innovative tool that streamlines the planning process for users. #chatgpt https://thenextweb.com/news/next-trip-you-book-online-could-be-planned-with-chatgpt

stories.Title: Cleaning up the space
stories.Description: ODIN Space's experimental sensor aims to track tiny dangers in the cosmos. A remarkable technology that fills a very important gap in the space sector: the fight against debris.
stories.Tweet: Cleaning up the space 📦 ODIN Space's experimental sensor aims to track tiny dangers in the cosmos. A remarkable technology that fills a very important gap in the space sector: the fight against debris. #space https://gizmodo.com/odin-space-test-tracking-of-super-tiny-space-debris-1850583427

stories.Title: Don’t miss Virgin Galatic’s journey!
stories.Description: The company's first-ever commercial spaceflight will be live-streamed on June 29. Tune in, as the spaceplane takes off from New Mexico's Spaceport America.
stories.Tweet: Don’t miss Virgin Galatic’s journey! 📦 The company's first-ever commercial spaceflight will be live-streamed on June 29. Tune in, as the spaceplane takes off from New Mexico's Spaceport America. #virgingalactic https://www.space.com/virgin-galactic-1st-commercial-spaceflight-livestream

stories.Title: Falcon 9 just got a competition
stories.Description: China's Space Pioneer plans to launch a rocket similar to SpaceX's Falcon 9, called the Tianlong-3, equipped with a reusable first stage and a payload capacity of 17 tons to low Earth orbit.
stories.Tweet: Falcon 9 just got a competition 📦 China's Space Pioneer plans to launch a rocket similar to SpaceX's Falcon 9, called the Tianlong-3, equipped with a reusable first stage and a payload capacity of 17 tons to low Earth orbit. #space https://spacenews.com/chinese-company-plans-to-launch-rocket-comparable-to-falcon-9-in-2024/

stories.Title: NASA's all-electric dream comes to an end
stories.Description: The X-57 Maxwell, a project that aimed to revolutionize aviation's impact on the environment, concludes without taking flight as safety and budget challenges halted its journey.
stories.Tweet: NASA's all-electric dream comes to an end 📦 The X-57 Maxwell, a project that aimed to revolutionize aviation's impact on the environment, concludes without taking flight as safety and budget challenges halted its journey. #NASA https://spaceexplored.com/2023/06/27/nasa-to-conclude-all-electric-x-57-maxwell-aircraft-program/

stories.Title: NACS is steadily progressing
stories.Description: Tesla's charging connector continues its path to becoming the industry standard in the US. This momentum is further supported by SAE International's recent move to establish performance standards.
stories.Tweet: NACS is steadily progressing 📦 Tesla's charging connector continues its path to becoming the industry standard in the US. This momentum is further supported by SAE International's recent move to establish performance standards. #tesla https://apnews.com/article/tesla-electric-vehicle-charging-plug-standard-01ed6050d8ddfbbe2d27b83ddf0b9943

stories.Title: Tesla's charging frenzy gets a new member
stories.Description: Volvo takes the lead as the pioneer among European automakers by embracing Tesla's North American Charging Standard (NACS).
stories.Tweet: Tesla's charging frenzy gets a new member 📦 Volvo takes the lead as the pioneer among European automakers by embracing Tesla's North American Charging Standard (NACS). #volvo https://www.techtimes.com/articles/293102/20230627/volvo-confirms-adopting-tesla-nacs-charging-technology.htm

stories.Title: A farewell to Iris
stories.Description: Google's augmented reality glasses, known as "Iris," faced several setbacks that led to its shelving. However, with this unexpected turn, the company's focus now lies on AR software development.
stories.Tweet: A farewell to Iris 📦 Google's augmented reality glasses, known as "Iris," faced several setbacks that led to its shelving. However, with this unexpected turn, the company's focus now lies on AR software development. #google https://www.engadget.com/google-is-no-longer-building-its-own-augmented-reality-glasses-062555498.html

title: Nvidia teams up with Snowflake, Tesla's NACS hype continues, AI is your next trip planner
